data.speaker: Player
data.content: (I slash at the painting. A frenzy of cheers sounds in my head from the other paintings.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (The four remaining paintings cackle as I hear the dying sounds of the sacrifice.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (I think... I think I did the right thing here...)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (The hoarse whisper sounds in my head again. I can almost feel its warm breath on my neck.)
You killed the sacrifice. Now you must root out the dishonest.
You must destroy the liars! They will suffer under the weight of their falsehoods!
